name: Tenant Education and Outreach Program
objective: The purpose of the Tenant Education and Outreach (TEO) Program is to support tenant capacity building at eligible existing Project-Based Section 8 properties with the goal of preserving decent, safe, and sanitary housing within the Section 8 program.
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Housing -- Federal Housing Commissioner
beneficiary_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: Multifamily Assisted Housing Reform and Affordability Act of 1997 (MAHRA), 514 (f)(3).
